topic.title: Compiling an XSL Stylesheet for Saxon

keywords.indexterm: Editing XSLTCompile XSL Stylesheet for Saxon tool
Compile XSL Stylesheet for Saxon tool

body.p: As of Saxon 9.7, it is possible to export a compiled form of a stylesheet as an XML file (called a stylesheet export file or SEF). includes a simple tool called Compile XSL Stylesheet for Saxon (found in the ToolsXML Tools menu) that does this for you.

section.title: Use-Cases for a Stylesheet Export File (SEF)

ul.li: Use SEF to run transformations in - You can also use a stylesheet export file (SEF) in to apply an XSLT transformation over an XML file. This requires Saxon-EE or Saxon-PE versions of the Saxon product and you must select one of those two versions for the Target when you configure the SEF file. When configuring the XSLT transformation, you will specify the SEF file in the XSL URL field.

section.title: Compiling an SEF File
section.p: The Compile XSL Stylesheet for Saxon tool can be found in the ToolsXML Tools menu and it compiles a specified stylesheet as an XML file (stylesheet export file with a file extension of .sef).
Selecting this tool opens the Compile XSL Stylesheet for Saxon dialog box that allows you to configure some options for conversion.

fig.title: Compile XSL Stylesheet for Saxon Dialog Box
Compile XSL Stylesheet for Saxon Dialog Box

section.p:
This dialog box includes the following options:
XSL URL Allows you to select URL of the source XSL stylesheet. You can specify the URL by using the text field, the history drop-down, or the browsing actions in the Browse drop-down list.
Target Allows you to select the type of Saxon product that the export file will be used with. You can choose Saxon-JS, Saxon-EE, Saxon-PE, or Saxon-HE.
Output file You can specify the path where the output file will be saved by entering it in the text field, using the Insert Editor Variables button, or using the browsing tool buttons ().
Open in Editor Select this option to open the resulting stylesheet export file in the main editing pane.
Convert Use this button to generate the stylesheet export file according the options selected in this dialog box.
